resources.string: Error: Source file does not exist.
Error: SD card not present or read only.
Could not acquire root access.\nYou need a phone with a rooted firmware.\nIf this phone is already rooted, please make sure the application has enough permissions to execute the \"su\" command.
Error: Unable to figure out /system mount point.
Error: Unable to create temporary directory.
Error: No source could be used.\nPlease check paths or URLs.
Error: Unable to merge source files.
Error: Unable to write to preferences file.
Error: Unable to read to preferences file.
File copied.\nPlease restart to flush DNS cache.
Hosts file copied to SD card.
Cannot copy normally. Retrying with root access.

Author: Adrian Pasvante
